features: Experience the vibrant richness of Kayhoma Boho Style Fanny Packs, each handcrafted with 11 interwoven cotton threads to create a unique bohemian style. Thanks to a special irregular cutting method, no two packs are identical. Weighing in at just 3 ounces, it's perfect for travel without added burden.

These fanny pack boasts a spacious main compartment and two front pockets, all reinforced with double stitching and lined with durable nylon. These pockets are designed to comfortably house essentials like water bottles, cell phones (including iPhone Pro Series and Samsung Note Series ), sunglasses, keys, wallets, and more. Its thoughtful design ensures each item has its own space, preventing rubbing and potential damage, particularly important for electronics with screens and glasses.

The pack comes with a high-quality cotton belt that's soft to the touch, anti-static, and non-slip. Adjustable from 20" to 50", it features a plastic buckle tested to withstand over 40 pounds of pressure, ensuring your belongings are secure and the buckle remains fastened.

We've implemented improvements based on customer feedback, including a thicker nylon lining to prevent any bothersome swishing sounds, and double-stitched zippers for enhanced durability, ensuring they stay firmly in place.

Your satisfaction is our priority. Purchase with complete peace of mind knowing that if you're not 100% satisfied, you can return it for a full refund within 12 months of purchase. Experience the difference with Kayhoma's Boho Style Fanny Pack.
